  17. (* To print values *)

  19. open Format
  20. open Parser_aux
  21. open Types

  23. (* To name printed and ellipsed values *)

  25. ‌let named_values =
  26.   (Hashtbl.create 29 : (int, Debugcom.Remote_value.t * type_expr) Hashtbl.t)
  27. ‌let next_name = ref 1

  29. ‌let reset_named_values () =
  30.   Hashtbl.clear named_values;
  31.   next_name := 1

  33. ‌let name_value v ty =
  34.   let name = !next_name in
  35.   incr next_name;
  36.   Hashtbl.add named_values name (v, ty);
  37.   name

  39. ‌let find_named_value name =
  40.   Hashtbl.find named_values name

  42. ‌let check_depth depth obj ty =
  43.   if depth <= 0 then begin
  44.     let n = name_value obj ty in
  45.     Some (Outcometree.Oval_stuff ("$" ^ Int.to_string n))
  46.   end else None

  48. module EvalPath =
  49.   struct
  50. ‌    type valu = Debugcom.Remote_value.t
  51.     exception Error
  52. ‌    let rec eval_address = function
  53.     | Env.Aident id ->
  54.         begin try
  55.           Debugcom.Remote_value.global (Symtable.get_global_position id)
  56.         with Symtable.Error _ ->
  57.           raise Error
  58.         end
  59.     | Env.Adot(root, pos) ->
  60.         let v = eval_address root in
  61.         if not (Debugcom.Remote_value.is_block v)
  62.         then raise Error
  63.         else Debugcom.Remote_value.field v pos
  64. ‌    let same_value = Debugcom.Remote_value.same
  65.   end

  67. module Printer = Genprintval.Make(Debugcom.Remote_value)(EvalPath)

  69. ‌let install_printer path ty _ppf fn =
  70.   Printer.install_printer path ty
  71.     (fun ppf remote_val ->
  72.        try
  73.          fn ppf (Obj.repr (Debugcom.Remote_value.obj remote_val))
  74.        with
  75.          Debugcom.Marshalling_error ->
  76.            fprintf ppf "<cannot fetch remote object>")

  78. let remove_printer = Printer.remove_printer

  80. let max_printer_depth = ref 20
  81. let max_printer_steps = ref 300

  83. let print_exception ppf obj =
  84.   let t = Printer.outval_of_untyped_exception obj in
  85.   !Oprint.out_value ppf t

  87. ‌let print_value max_depth env obj (ppf : Format.formatter) ty =
  88.   let t =
  89.     Printer.outval_of_value !max_printer_steps max_depth
  90.       check_depth env obj ty in
  91.   !Oprint.out_value ppf t

  93. ‌let print_named_value max_depth exp env obj ppf ty =
  94.   let print_value_name ppf = function
  95.   | E_ident lid ->
  96.       Printtyp.longident ppf lid
  97.   | E_name n ->
  98.       fprintf ppf "$%i" n
  99.   | _ ->
  100.       let n = name_value obj ty in
  101.       fprintf ppf "$%i" n in
  102.   fprintf ppf "@[<2>%a:@ %a@ =@ %a@]@."
  103.   print_value_name exp
  104.   Printtyp.type_expr ty
  105.   (print_value max_depth env obj) ty
